product_name: Starbucks VIA Ready Brew Instant Coffee - Package of 8
long_description: This 8-pack of great-tasting Starbucks VIA(TM) Ready Brew instant coffee lets you start every morning off right-whether you're at home, in the office or halfway up an alpine peak! Simply pour a Starbucks VIA(TM) Ready Brew coffee packet into your mug, add 8 oz. hot or cold water, let the coffee brew 10 sec., give it a stir and enjoy! Colombia delivers medium intensity with a smooth, nutty, well-balanced flavor. Italian Roast is extra bold with a deep roasted flavor. Made with high-quality 100% arabica beans and a proprietary, all-natural process. Includes 8 compact handy packets that slip easily into a jacket or backpack pocket. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This 8-pack of great-tasting Starbucks VIA(TM) Ready Brew instant coffee lets you start every morning off right-whether you're at home, in the office or halfway up an alpine peak!
